findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The smart contract allows minting an unlimited number of tokens without any restrictions.

findings.title: Unprotected function calls
findings.description: The contracts contain unprotected function calls which can lead to unauthorized state changes.

findings.title: Centralization Risk
findings.description: Active contract ownership identified, which creates a risk of rug pull scams and centralization hacks.
